comments.author: Jamieson McCormack

comments.text:
Okay that all sucks but having a way too normal name sucks too. Everyone 
forgets it despite it being so easy. I have been called every normal and 
not-normal name starting with the same letter in existence. Plus, there's a 
lot of unnecessary nicknames that are just plain stupid. I had three other 
"Jenny"s in a class in High school. they all hated me because I happened to 
be the newest person in the area with that name so I "stole their name." 
Also, no one ever refers to you in the way that you just want to be called. 
There's no "Jenny" there's only "Jennie", "Jeanie", "Jen", "Penny", 
"Jen-ay!!", "Jen-AY~~!!!", and "J-lo" for the love of dirt. None of those 
are appreciated unless given permission to do so. Plus, the whole spelling 
thing is a problem still. No one ever spells my name right and there's only 
FIVE little letters to put together. Seriously, how hard can it be?﻿
comments.author: Jennifer Welch

comments.text:
My name's a Russian name and sometimes people ask me if I'm Russian, no I'm

there's many different ways to spell my name and different ways to 
pronounce it but do not correct me on my own name. by the way my name's 
Tatiana.﻿
